pages.text: Turbines Blades are part of the $(l:multiblocks/turbine)Industrial Turbine$(/l) multiblock.$(p)Each Turbine Blade needs to be placed on a $(l:blocks/turbine/turbine_rotor)Turbine Rotor$(/l), and each Turbine Blade will add onto the $(l:multiblocks/turbine)Industrial Turbine's$(/l) max power production.
